channel.title: Need help please :(
channel.description: i recently got a new computer and have tried to start a new server. i have downloaded like 3 sources and clients to match. i get them running and log on and everytime i try to walk the client crashes.... quite confusing. any ideas?

item.title: Need help please :(
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

you are using 64 bit.

make a new run.bat with this code in it

@echo off
cls
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit
pause

run the Client with the new run.bat, not the server

Read full topic
